verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Marching on,
marching on,
For Christ count everything but loss!

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
And to crown Him King,
toil and sing
‘Neath the banner of the cross!

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
There’s a royal banner given for display
To the soldiers of the King;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
As an ensign fair
we lift it up today,
While as ransomed
ones we sing.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Though the foe may rage
and gather as the flood,
Let the standard
be displayed;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
And beneath its folds,
as soldier of the Lord,
For the truth
be not dismayed!

verse.name: v3a
v3b
verse.lines:
Of the crimson banner
now the story tell.
While the Lord shall claim His own!

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
When the glory dawns
’tis drawing very near
It is hastening day by day

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Then before our King
the foe shall disappear,
And the cross the world shall sway!
